topic.title: How to can I customize myZeroTalk ?
topic.body:
I cloned ZeroTalk with images (1C2JhCunGLtvyX56nQ88tcb87WnXspjWN) and want it to customize:

* How can I create a sticked message?
* How can I translate (to spanish) the user languages (where is the file)?
* How can I create sub-topics like "P2P news flow"?
* How can I change the File-Type to be accepted to upload to the board ?
* How can I remove messages?
